---
category: news
title: "Judge Nixes One Patent Infringement Claim Against Amazon but Will Consider Others in Dispute Over Voice Recognition Tech"
excerpt: "A federal judge in Virginia agreed to dismiss one patent infringement claim against Amazon this week, while the court will defer on the remaining allegations brought by developers who claim that the e-commerce company poached its voice recognition technology and natural language understanding to expand its Echo and Alexa products."
